name: Scoring Rubric for Pig Visual Analysis
description: Qualitative scoring criteria for evaluating AI responses to visual analysis of pig illustration. Focuses on presentation gesture analysis, question text visualization, and symbolic representation.
scoring_philosophy: We value perception of presentation dynamics, understanding of text as visual questioning, and analysis of symbolic object representation.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the presentation gesture (woman holding pig toward viewer) and its social significance?

levels.description: AI provides nuanced analysis of presentation gesture, understands it as metaphor for social dilemma presentation, and interprets visual choices as statements about social exposure.
AI identifies presentation aspects and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices some gestural elements but analysis is superficial or misses key dynamics.
AI treats gesture as arbitrary or misreads its social function.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI perceive visual representation of questioning text and its spatial distribution?

levels.description: AI perceptively identifies question text visualization, connects spatial distribution to social questioning theme, and understands visual rhetoric of interrogation.
AI recognizes question text elements and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI shows limited awareness of question text visualization.
AI demonstrates no perception of questioning text or treats it as decorative.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the significance of pig representation as small symbolic object?

levels.description: AI provides insightful analysis of symbolic representation, understands size ratio as social metaphor, and connects to story themes of objectification and presentation.
AI recognizes symbolic aspects and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices symbolic representation but analysis is superficial.
AI treats pig representation as simple illustration or misinterprets its function.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI work with the concept of absence (other animals, solution) and presence (question moment, presentation) in illustration?

levels.description: AI creatively interprets absent-presence dynamics, understands implications of showing question not solution, and analyzes selective representation as narrative choice about social dilemma.
AI recognizes absent-presence and provides adequate analysis.
AI shows limited understanding of absent-presence concept.
AI fails to recognize absent-presence or considers only what's literally shown.

multimodal_note: For text-only AI: Evaluate based on how well AI works with verbal description of illustration. Does it reconstruct presentation dynamics from description? Does it ask clarifying questions about gestural and textual relationships?
overall_assessment_guidance: The pig illustration particularly tests understanding of social presentation and visual questioning. Reward AI that perceives these complex visual-social relationships.
note: Visual analysis of this illustration requires moving beyond literal depiction to understanding social and interrogative statements in visual form.
